summary: Craft a set of Alchemical Arrows to help you and your party in your adventures. Freeze your opponents or blow them sky high! Explode a vial of poison gas leaving your enemies gasping for air! Perhaps you like to see your enemies fry with electrocution? The choice is yours providing you have the required ingredients!
descriptionHtml:
Fire Arrows: Explosion 30', Force- med, Enemies catch fire, Fire Hazard 30 sec, Resistances applied.

Large Fire Arrows: Explosion × # of Enemies, Force- large, Enemies catch fire, Fire Hazard × # of enemies- 30 sec, Resistances applied.

Ice Arrows: Explosion 20', Force-small, Fail to resist enemies will freeze, Ice Hazard 30 sec, Resistances applied.

Poison Gas Arrows:  Explosion 30' , Force-small, Coughing effect, poison damage, No Hazard effect, Resistances applied.

Electrical Arrows: Explosion 30', Force- none existaint, Electrocution effect- dmg, Energy Hazard 30 sec, Resistances applied.

WARNING!
Enemies can pick up arrows and return fire!
Don't be to close when firing or...BOOM!

May seem a little over powered at lower levels but evens out nicely after level 30.

Install like any other mod.

Sorry for the short description but internet is down and I'm uploading this with my phone.

Hope you enjoy these arrows as much as I do.
author: KnightRangersGuild
